text:
Twice my father was hired to be exclusively WFH. One company spent 5 years courting him. And both companies revoked his WFH status after 1-3 years. 

Seeing as he was already technically retired and too bored to not work, they should have anticipated his reaction. ‚ÄúI quit.‚Äù 

(One of these companies wanted him to move 941 miles. He laughed in their faces. )
